title: ENV01 - Emissions of air pollutants
publisher: Department for Environment Food & Rural Affairs
description: Annual update to tables on emissions of important air pollutants in the UK.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll down to the bottom of the page and a tables document can be located in an ODS format , a CSV can be obtained by clicking on the link above this data set however that does not contain all the information contained in the ODS
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with footnotes, some tabs  have 2 tables with numbers and percentages.
notes: a CSV can be obtained by clicking on the link above this data set however that does not contain all the information contained in the ODS
